channel.title: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?
channel.description: :confused:how do I i need relly bad help.

item.title: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?
item.dc:creator: @da_crip da crip
item.description:
@da_crip wrote:

if ur using testscape search for admin list. Then u should see this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

change the admin to ur name or ur friends name.

then if u scroll down there are other names and other player rights.

player rights: 0 = normal, 1 = pmod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner (should only be one owner)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?

item.title: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?
item.dc:creator: @tyguy tyguy
item.description:
@tyguy wrote:

Or a easier way is…
1.Open HybridScape folder
2.Open Characters folder
3.In There you should see yours and your friends files(if made)
4.Open them up in notepad.
5. Under the
[CHARACTER]
character-height = 1
character-posx = 3217
character-posy = 3472
character-rights = 3 [glow=red,2,300]<change this[/glow]
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20061119
character-energy = 999999219
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 28260

lvls
0= no rights regular person
1= White crowns-some rights
2= Gold crown-all rights just can’t use command ::kick (playername)
3= Gold Crown- ALL RIGHTS- Server admin can use command ::kick(playername)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?

item.title: How do I make my self owner and frends admin/mod on my sever?
item.dc:creator: @Red_Wave Red Wave
item.description:
@Red_Wave wrote:

Go to “data” then click “admins”, “mod”, “staff”, and enter their names.
and set ur player rights to 3

Read full topic
